title: Forever101
author: Forever101
content: My people, the day wey I notice say this forum pass bounty matter , that day I just dey curious to know more about other boards, na so I just see 'new post' under one particular board like that. Na so hit the button , e carry me go where I go write. Hmmm. I begin write ooo, later I con post am.After I post am, body they shark me . After small time people they throw away reply give me, body con dey shark me more, the sharking make me reason am say, I dey see people they reply others for their post. So I decide to hit the quote button , boom na ihm be that.As I know how to reply people, I start to deu reply every single person wey reply for my post. The shock I later recieved be say when I later logins I recieve message say my quote dey deleted cause some of my quote(reply) just be like, "that's good, thanks, absolutely right". Na den I con realize say unnecessary posting is not needed. I go back to the rule to know what is needed. I go thank lovesfamily for in support as inh take plead for me for some of post wey get mistake as some people dey throw way Banga for me. Now I don learn my lesson

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on May 27, 2023, 10:06:51 AMMy people, the day wey I notice say this forum pass bounty matter , that day I just dey curious to know more about other boards, na so I just see 'new post' under one particular board like that. Na so hit the button , e carry me go where I go write. Hmmm. I begin write ooo, later I con post am.After I post am, body they shark me . After small time people they throw away reply give me, body con dey shark me more, the sharking make me reason am say, I dey see people they reply others for their post. So I decide to hit the quote button , boom na ihm be that.As I know how to reply people, I start to deu reply every single person wey reply for my post. Make I no lie you, people wey de do bounty get reason for doing that even though we know say the bounty no de pay like before as much project no de legit as before, but I know say one day dem go cash out too.But this forum is actually pass bounty  by far because if you de do bounty, you no go know anything we de happen for other sections of the forum, and there some good information about Bitcoin in the other sections.The reply wey you de talk na the same thing with the normal proof of authentication and link submission wey bounty hunters de do, but their own na mainly on the same bounty thread.QuoteThe shock I later recieved be say when I later logins I recieve message say my quote dey deleted cause some of my quote(reply) just be like, "that's good, thanks, absolutely right". Na den I con realize say unnecessary posting is not needed. I go back to the rule to know what is needed. I go thank lovesfamily for in support as inh take plead for me for some of post wey get mistake as some people dey throw way Banga for me. Now I don learn my lessonThose small small reply de look like spam, na why moderators de delete them.We de always learn, so na normal thing mate, the ting be say as you don improve make u keep am up and I de assure you say you go get reward for this.

comments.author: Igebotz
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on May 27, 2023, 10:06:51 AMThe shock I later recieved be say when I later logins I recieve message say my quote dey deleted cause some of my quote(reply) just be like, "that's good, thanks, absolutely right". Na den I con realize say unnecessary posting is not needed. I go back to the rule to know what is needed. I go thank lovesfamily for in support as inh take plead for me for some of post wey get mistake as some people dey throw way Banga for me. Now I don learn my lessonI guess you were caught for plagiarism, well nobody is here to judge you, and if you were given a second chance make the most of it because not everyone had such a privilege, and there is nothing wrong with participating in bounties but if you want to become a big part of the community or want anyone to take you seriously you must delete those shits POA from your post history and adjust yourself to the general board more frequently except your sole purpose of coming to the forum is bountiesThose posts were deleted because they were off-topic or of low value - you'll put more effort into your writing now.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on May 27, 2023, 10:06:51 AMMy people, the day wey I notice say this forum pass bounty matter , that day I just dey curious to know more about other boards, na so I just see 'new post' under one particular board like that. I go thank lovesfamily for in support as inh take plead for me for some of post wey get mistake as some people dey throw way Banga for me. Now I don learn my lessonWe're u a Bounty Hunter? You are welcome to di main board. Dat is why we dey advise piple to read the rules of the forum before posting. Even dis local board has rules oo go and read them so u no go violate here too. Weti I go tell u be sae, read oda piple their posts nd comments more dan writing 4 now so u go do well in di forum. Make u no go imitate anoda pesn write up, do ur own and leave. Here I dey see sae u go do am b4 nd e dey bad well well. So try ur best.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Bounty hunting is not totally bad but the truth is no one will take you seriously if your post histories are made up of bounty links and all manner of external links, but then if you focus more on learning about the entire cryptocurrency industry and try to find yourself in a position that aligns with your skills and fine such way to offers your services and get paid in either bitcoin or any other crypto coin which Is on of major advantages of cryptocurrencies serving as an alternative payment, so,, in essence knowledge is very important and that is the reason why your posts where deleted because it lacks the basic contents to meet the standard of the forum and I am sure if you can put more efforts to learn more it helps a lot mate.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on May 27, 2023, 10:06:51 AMMy people, the day wey I notice say this forum pass bounty matter , that day I just dey curious to know more about other boards, na so I just see 'new post' under one particular board like that. Now I don learn my lesson            Okotoriba!!!!!!!You get luck  say dem no nack you big hama for head your body for tell you. You see why it is good to read  before you jump enter wetin you no know. You see ehn this forum big pass bounty matter or doings o. If you settle down well, you go grabs very fast to move up. There are still lots to learn about the forum mate. Omo no need to fear, na gradual process you go get there with time na just patience you go need to exercise while you dey grow forthe forum.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: E good as you don know the important of using the forum more and interacting instead wey you go just dey do bounty hunting only. If you settle down rank up come get work you go know the joy wey dey come with forum signature rather than bounty. Bounty good oo, but na seasonal and some dey turn to scam after you don work for at least more than 1 month and dem no still pay, e dey painful like that. Now wey you wan leave bounty hunting, make sure say you follow and read rules very well for the forum, if you do that, you no get issue for here again, you go just dey rank up gradually.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: My broda, na since June last yr u join dis forum o. Since den, ur matter b lik na bounty chop ur head else, u na old persn 4 d forum way suppose don rch far. Anyhw e be, u don see say better no dey 4 where u bin dey luk nd u don dey try anoda side. Na d better tin u don do b dat.Watin I go like mak u do now b say, mak u try avoid anytin bounty, commot bodi. U no fit dey that way nd u go xpect say pple 4 here go tak u serious. I jst run tru ur post history nd ur report jst plenty everywhere lik say, u nevr commot hand.Go delete ur bounty post dem mak pple carri anoda eye dey see u.

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on May 27, 2023, 10:06:51 AMMy people, the day wey I notice say this forum pass bounty matter , that day I just dey curious to know more about other boards, na so I just see 'new post' under one particular board like that. Na so hit the button , e carry me go where I go write. Hmmm. I begin write ooo, later I con post am.You try ooo, I don even check your post history and I see say e no bad, but make we all still dey careful, incase if you no sabi something local board dey for you wey u go fit ask, nobody go blast you for here, highest dey go correct you. make you try avoid plagiarism, anything wey you wan write and you know say no be you get am make sure say you quote where u copy am from and make sure say you add source link, e dey very important, if you don add source link no body fit talk say u plagiarize again. Me self na bounty I dey do before, na as I see say bounty no dey pay again na why me self come dey try rank up small small I come enter signature, you self fit rank up, Dis one wey na just rubbish bounties dey now, u no go really make any better money.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: My advice to you be sae leave bounty hunter work and focus on building your account. You see this bounties wey you d rush to d do and complete there weekly post no worth am. Many of them na scam, some there tokens na worthless even if em worth something na small amount of the token you go finally get due to the involvement of many bounty hunters participant. I d tell you this because of my past involvement with altcoin bounties. Having said that there are so many things to learn from this forum if you navigate through other board sections. The more you begin to go through other boards na so em go the open up your reasoning of wetin you need to learn and unlearn for the forum via making posts, replying posts. You see as your forum account d so, em d like your office. You need to build am properly because you will be rated by what you engage yourself into with it. Your post history is made up of your participation in altcoin bounties. Em no make sense atall if I should advice you

comments.author: Nheer
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on May 27, 2023, 10:06:51 AMMy people, the day wey I notice say this forum pass bounty matter , that day I just dey curious to know more about other boards, na so I just see 'new post' under one particular board like that. Na den I con realize say unnecessary posting is not needed. I go back to the rule to know what is needed. I go thank lovesfamily for in support as inh take plead for me for some of post wey get mistake as some people dey throw way Banga for me. Now I don learn my lessonNa why dem de always advise say make we read the rules first before we do anything here. I think say you de lucky say you no go mistakenly commit offense. Sometimes we learn through taking risk sha but pls lets all be careful, there is nothing bad in asking questions when you need answers. This forum large and a lot de happen inside this forum, na just when you de enter inside different sections you go find out say almost everything wey de run for this world dey happen here too. This forum pass just bounty and e get plenty opportunities wey de here.

comments.author: knowngunman
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on May 27, 2023, 10:06:51 AMMy people, the day wey I notice say this forum pass bounty matter , that day I just dey curious to know more about other boards, na so I just see 'new post' under one particular board like that. When you do mistake you should have people to put you through into the right way but majority of our people here like to criticizes rather than to correct. I commend your courage for the trial and heed to correction. If the high rank members here in our midst are ready to help we'll have been more successful in this forum than we are now. Some of them are really are icon and deserves some accolade but some among them are very selfish set of people who don't like others to prosper.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: From my understanding of your post e be like say na the person wey carry you come this forum,na e tell you about bounty. If not how you take know about bounty and come put more interest for am. This forum was created to learn and educate users about bitcoin and other crpytocurrency and you wet come the forum then deviate from this purpose,the management board and other forum members go see you as person wey see the forum as a place to cash out instead of learning. This go make people no send you or to assist you with merit so that make you too grow. Bounty na chasing of shadows because better money dey signature campaign when you don rank up to participate for Sig campaign. I happy say you don realize your mistake and come wake up fast to follow up for the general boards. I beg e good make any new place wey you find yourself,make u know how them dey do things for there either by asking or reading so that you no go do things anyhow wet go fit implicate you.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on May 27, 2023, 10:06:51 AM The shock I later recieved be say when I later logins I recieve message say my quote dey deleted cause some of my quote(reply) just be like, "that's good, thanks, absolutely right". Na den I con realize say unnecessary posting is not needed. I go back to the rule to know what is needed. I go thank lovesfamily for in support as inh take plead for me for some of post wey get mistake as some people dey throw way Banga for me. Now I don learn my lessonIt's good you got to realize on time that this forum has got something more of value than bounting hunting, and im happy for you for discovering on time, because the the forum has rules and whenever violated, it is the work of moderators to take action on time, and those rules are listed on this forum which is a must read for every beginners, which if you never read am, here is the link Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQ and this other one Newbies - Read before postingYou just have to note that the forum frown at members writing only 2 or 3 letter words in the comment sections (i.e Thanks you & That is good) as all of these are classified as spam.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Beware of this kind of category of mistakes some people made while posting or quoting some one and I've been taking note on this areas while quoting other or making my own post.1. Don't quote a physhing link, scam post or shitpost because your own post together with their shits will end up being deleted or if lucky on off topic.2. Don't always quote while posting except if necessary and try to learn how to edit out some contents before posting to make your quote more specific.3. Don't join in mega quoting always whereby more than four or five quotes have already been made and you're making an additional quote on them.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Good experience op,I believe u will not try such thing again until you retire from bitcointalk.org. well, every newbies always have experienced to share from their beginning which is always rough for every newbies in this forum.pls u need to be very careful like d advise some of our senior men give to u, so that u will have more opportunities to learn.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Meh nothing dey bad here sha but e depends on how you carry run ur parole for this industry go matta your longevity because normally I noticed am say we 9ja dey always find shortcut but forgotten say here na international standard place wey be say man supposed stand up to dey read everything ends to ends.If only we go bring out our mind settle down and develop the habit of reading e go really fasten and enhance your operation here than to dey look for shortcut to bycut reading and the rest, I believe say no be only you don join the forum and I also believe say you no go be the last person as well.
